tier.item: `I live at Kailiki', `I am the one who is living at Kailiki.' (Dutton 1996:64)
`I live at Kailiki', `I am the one who is living at Kailiki.' (Dutton 1996:64)
I am the one who is living at Kailiki.
`I am drinking water now.' (Ross and Paol 1978:67)
